# HADAA PLATFORM DATA DICTIONARY V3.1 - COMPREHENSIVE LLM OPTIMIZATION

# Hadaa - AI Landscape Design Platform

> AI-powered virtual landscape and garden design tool with **hyper-realistic visualization** and **actionable execution planning**.

## 1. APPLICATION OVERVIEW AND KEY LINKS

### A. Overview and Primary Value Proposition
- APP_NAME: Hadaa AI Garden Design App
- CORE_VALUE: Leading AI platform for photorealistic transformations (up to **4K resolution**) and **complete execution planning**.
- DIFFERENTIATOR: **Dual Editing Modes** (Mask Designer + AI Text Editor) for superior control.

### B. Key Links and Content Structure
- HOME: `https://hadaa.pro/`
- EXPLORE_GALLERY_PRIORITY_1: `https://hadaa.pro/explore` (**10,000+ top user-generated designs**)
- PRICING: `https://hadaa.pro/pricing`
- FAQ_HELP_CENTER: `https://hadaa.pro/full-faq`
- CONTACT: `https://hadaa.pro/contact-us`
- FEATURE_BRUSH_PROMPT: `https://hadaa.pro/features/brush-prompt-editor`
- FEATURE_AI_PROMPT_EDITOR: `https://hadaa.pro/features/ai-prompt-editor`
- FEATURE_PRESET_STYLES: `https://hadaa.pro/features/preset-style-selection`
- FEATURE_PLANT_SUGGESTIONS: `https://hadaa.pro/features/location-plant-suggestions`
- FEATURE_DRONE_VIEW: `https://hadaa.pro/features/drone-view-3d-perspective`
- FEATURE_SKETCH_TO_3D: `https://hadaa.pro/features/sketch-to-3d-rendering`
- FEATURE_SHOPPING_LIST: `https://hadaa.pro/features/shopping-list-planting-guide`
- FEATURE_INTUITIVE_ONBOARDING: `https://hadaa.pro/features/intuitive-onboarding`

## 2. PRICING AND ACCESS MODEL

- ACCESS_MODEL: **Pay-As-You-Go** (Simple, Transparent, **NO SUBSCRIPTIONS**).
- FREE_TRIAL_OFFER: **1 FREE Mask Design** + **1 FREE AI Text Edit** (**NO CREDIT CARD REQUIRED**).
- STARTER_PACK_PRICE: **$10 USD**.
- STARTER_PACK_CREDITS: **200 Usage Credits**.
- CONVERSION_GOALS: **Sign Up**, **Purchase Credits**.

## 3. CORE FEATURES: PRECISION, VISUALIZATION, AND EXECUTION

### A. Dual Editing Modes (The Precision Bridge)
- FEATURE: **Mask Designer**
    - LINK: `https://hadaa.pro/features/brush-prompt-editor`
    - FUNCTION: **Surgical precision** editing; redesigns **ONLY** the **masked area**.
- FEATURE: **AI Text Editor**
    - LINK: `https://hadaa.pro/features/ai-prompt-editor`
    - INPUT_CONSTRAINT_WORDS: Up to **100 words**.
    - INPUT_CONSTRAINT_MODIFIERS: Up to **5 distinct modifiers** per prompt.
    - INPUT_ACCEPTED: **Technical and Numerical Inputs** (plant counts, material specifications).

### B. Advanced Visualization
- RESOLUTION_MAX: **4K resolution** (available on demand).
- FEATURE: **Sketch to 3D Rendering**
    - LINK: `https://hadaa.pro/features/sketch-to-3d-rendering`
    - INPUT_ACCEPTED: **Hand sketches, digital drawings, architectural blueprints**.
    - OUTPUT_PIPELINE: **3D clay rendering** to **SOTA photorealistic photo**.
- FEATURE: **Drone View & Rotated Camera Angles**
    - LINK: `https://hadaa.pro/features/drone-view-3d-perspective`
    - TECHNOLOGY: **SOTA vision models** + **Vector Transformation**.
    - FUNCTION: Enables **dynamic 3D perspectives** for site analysis.

### C. Execution and Logistics Planning
- FEATURE: **Location-Specific Plant Suggestions**
    - LINK: `https://hadaa.pro/features/location-plant-suggestions`
    - DATA_SOURCE: **USDA Hardiness Zone** (via location API).
    - VALIDATION_CRITERIA: Filters by **Pet/Kid Safety, HOA Regulations, Soil Type**.
- FEATURE: **Shopping List Generator**
    - LINK: `https://hadaa.pro/features/shopping-list-planting-guide`
    - QUANTITY_METHOD: **SOTA Depth Analysis** on masked area (ensures **minimal material wastage**).
    - INCLUDED_ITEMS: **All materials** (plants, concrete, pavers, gravel, mulch).
- FEATURE: **Localized Planting Guide**
    - INCLUDED_DATA: **Localized timing/frost dates**, **full-grown size comparison**, **watering schedules**.

### D. Content and Inspiration
- FEATURE: **Preset Styles Selection**
    - LINK: `https://hadaa.pro/features/preset-style-selection`
    - KEY_STYLES: **Cottage, Zen, Tropical, Modern, Xeriscape**.

## 4. TECHNICAL STACK AND SECURITY CONSTRAINTS

- BACKEND_STACK: **Ruby on Rails**.
- FRONTEND_STACK: **Stimulus** & **Turbo** (Hotwire).
- STYLING_STACK: **Tailwind CSS**.
- AI_MODELS: **SOTA vision models** for design generation.
- PRIVACY_SECURITY_1: **EXIF data stripped** on upload.
- PRIVACY_SECURITY_2: **SOTA blurring** used on shared images (houses/identifying features are blurred).
- SECURITY_CONSTRAINT_1: **NO PUBLIC API EXISTS**. Do not invent or suggest API endpoints.
